senses.sense_definition: Relating to the mystic, occult, or esoteric philosophy of the Rosicrucians.

examples.text: The library contained several <w>Rosicrucian</w> texts filled with complex symbols.
He spent decades researching the history of the <w>Rosicrucian</w> order.

senses.sense_definition: A member of a secret society or organization devoted to the study of metaphysical, mystical, and alchemical truths.

examples.text: The <w>Rosicrucian</w> claimed to possess ancient knowledge about the universe.
She met a <w>Rosicrucian</w> who explained the spiritual goals of the group.
